description: This file provides utility functions for handling environment variable mappings and templates for different frameworks within a larger project. It includes functions to load YAML configuration files, parse templates, apply prefixes, and map environment variables between common and framework-specific representations.

methods.name: Path get_template_path(framework: str)
methods.description: Determines the file path to the environment template for a specified framework based on the current directory.

methods.name: Tuple[Optional[str],Dict[str,str]] parse_template_file(template_path: Path)
methods.description: Loads and parses a YAML template file to extract an optional prefix and a mapping of environment variables.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str)
methods.description: Applies a specified prefix to all environment variables in a given dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Converts a set of common environment variables into framework-specific variables using a YAML template, including direct mappings and optional prefix application.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Converts framework-specific environment variables back to common variables using the specified YAML template.

methods.name: list get_supported_frameworks()
methods.description: Returns a list of frameworks for which environment templates are available.

ctags.name: apply_prefix_mapping
ctags.pattern: /^def apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_common_to_framework
ctags.pattern: /^def map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_framework_to_common
ctags.pattern: /^def map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/
